required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Real-life Study of Cabozantinib in Advanced Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC)
clinical_study.official_title: REPLICA: Real Patient Life Treatment With Cabozantinib in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic RCC: A Descriptive and Prospective Non-Interventional Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to describe the real-life use of Cabometyx® in Belgium and the Netherlands in patients with advanced or metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma (1st, 2nd and later lines of treatment)

primary_outcome.description: Treatment line will be assessed at baseline. It is a percentage of patients receiving cabozantinib as 1st, 2nd or later lines of treatment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop
primary_outcome.description: Number of dose reductions and reason

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop
primary_outcome.description: Number of treatment interruptions and reason

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with permanent discontinuation and reason

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with schedules other than 1 pill at fixed dose/day for the total treatment period

primary_outcome.measure: Mean number of any dose modification
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop

primary_outcome.measure: Median number of any dose modification
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop

primary_outcome.measure: Median time to any first dose modification
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop

primary_outcome.measure: Median time to end of treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months
From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months

primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with dose of 60 mg/day, 40 mg/day or 20 mg/day at baseline

primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months
primary_outcome.description: Estimation of average daily dose received by subject during the treatment exposure

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Quality of Life score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to 6 to 8 weeks after cabozantinib initiation and within 10 days of cabozantinib stop
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in quality of life data by comparing changes in scores on Using the National Comprehensive Cancer Network/Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy Kidney Symptom Index-19 (NFKSI-19). It describes the severity, interference, and frequency rates.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months
secondary_outcome.description: Radiological progression using RECIST 1.1 or investigator assessed or according to local standard of care or death; PFS evaluated at least every 12 weeks under treatment with cabozantinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of patients with partial and complete response during the treatment with cabozantinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until the end of study up to 9 months
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of patients with stable disease, partial and complete response during the treatment with cabozantinib

clinical_study.condition: Advanced or Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma

study_pop.textblock: advanced or metastatic renal cell carcinoma

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Males or females aged 18 years and older
- Patients scheduled to receive Cabometyx® for advanced or metastatic renal cell carcinoma
- Decision to treat patients with Cabometyx® has to be taken prior to and independent from participation in the clinical study
- Provision of written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in another clinical study at the same time
- Previous participation in this clinical study
